slide.text: Need to reduce by 30% as a first step to free grid capacity for other sectors to also move to clean electricity
needs to dramatically accelerate and extend to deep energy refurbishment: 4%/yr
and mixed low carbon heat sources is the only modelled pathway to hit IPCC goals for energy reduction and decarbonisation of space heating and cooling.
in buildings also needs to be reduced through low carbon materials and building designs.
